title: Welcome to My Game
subtitle: A classic solitaire card game
howToPlaySteps: Move all cards to the foundation piles.
Use free cells to temporarily hold cards.
Build tableau columns in descending order and alternating colors.
aboutContent: Welcome to our site! We provide the best free online games for everyone to enjoy.
privacyContent: Your privacy is important to us. This page explains how we collect and use your data.
termsContent: By using this site, you agree to follow these rules and conditions.
